items.title: can; to know how to
items.comment: Indicates ability or learned skill, such as speaking a language.

items.title: to speak; to say
items.comment: Common verb used when talking about speaking a language or saying something.

items.title: Do you (or your mother) speak Chinese?
Can you speak Chinese?
items.comment: Used to ask if someone can speak Chinese.

items.title: I can speak Chinese.
items.comment: Used to say that you can speak Chinese.

items.title: Can your mother speak Chinese?
items.pinyin: nǐ māma huì shuō Hànyǔ ma?
items.pronounce: nee mah-ma hway shwaw han-yoo ma?
items.comment: Used to ask if someone's mother can speak Chinese.

items.title: She can't speak (Chinese).
items.comment: A negative response, meaning she cannot speak (Chinese is implied).
